content:
Who would've thought that little Glenn had such great potential,
organizing both the sales and recycling work
so perfectly and efficiently.
{me}, I have a discovery I'd like to share with you~
Everyone here makes me feel so at ease!

Glenn offers a service to buy your odds and ends.
Once you sell off items you don't need,
you'll have money to buy the things you do need.
{me}, do you have things that you feel bad throwing away, but can't find any use for?
